oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Songwriter Session - Josh Mirenda and Jaron Boyer - 2017-12-02
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance by singer songwriters Josh Mirenda and Jaron Boyer from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on December 2, 2017. Includes questions from the audience.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Josh Mirenda; Jaron Boyer;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Walk-in music / (00:25) Opening comments and songwriter introduction by Abi Tapia / (04:13) Opening comments / (06:10) Performs Tryin' To Untangle My Mind (Jaron Boyer) / (08:43) Talk about the last song and introduction of the next song / (10:40) Performs They Don't Know (Josh Mirenda) / (14:02) Josh answers question about his songwriting background / (14:47) Josh and Jarod answer question about how often they write songs / (16:53) Josh answers question about accepting song ideas / (17:57) Jaron introduces the next song / (18:09) Performs Hell Of A Night (Jaron Boyer) / (21:37) Josh talks about hanging out with Dustin Lynch / (22:09) Josh talks about his next song / (22:56) Performs I Got You (Josh Mirenda) / (25:58) Josh answers question about getting ideas for songs / (27:45) Jaron and Josh answer question about creating demonstration recordings / (29:53) Answers question about being an artist and choosing songs /

(31:00) Answers question about how long it can take to write a song / (31:57) Answers question about song ownership / (32:41) Answers question about the craft of songwriting / (34:05) Answers question about when they realized they wanted to be a songwriter / (34:56) Introduces the next song / (35:47) Performs Flatliner (Jaron Boyer) / (39:15) Introduces the next song / (41:20) Performs Somewhere On A Beach (Josh Mirenda) / (44:33) Final comments / (44:45) Walk-out music / (51:47) Walk-out music end / (53:22) Mic check / (54:54) FILE END
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Mirenda, Josh; Boyer, Jaron; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
